Name: autoimmune disease of peripheral nervous system
Definition: An autoimmune disease of the nervous system that is the abnormal functioning of the immune system that causes your immune system to produce antibodies or T cells against cells and/or tissues in the peripheral nervous system.

Name: obsolete medical disorder
Definition: A disease that is present at birth due to a genetic abnormality

Name: autonomic nervous system disease
Definition: A brain disease that is characterized by pressure on the intracranial tissues by an effusion of blood or cerebrospinal fluid

Name: Cauda equina syndrome
Definition: A peripheral nervous system disease that involves an acute loss of function of the lumbar plexus

Name: obsolete Escherichia coli meningitis
Definition: A peripheral nervous system disease that involves an acute loss of function of the lumbar plexus

Name: polyneuropathy
Definition: A peripheral system disease that is characterized by is damage affecting peripheral nerves (peripheral neuropathy) in roughly the same areas on both sides of the body

Name: lumbosacral plexus lesion
Definition: A color blindness that is characterized by a congenital cone color vision disorder

Name: hemangioma of peripheral nerve
Definition: An autonomic nervous system benign neoplasm that is characterized by the presence of mature ganglion cells and a mature Schwannian stroma and arises from the sympathetic trunk in the mediastinum.

Name: obsolete metastatic lung carcinoma
Definition: An autonomic nervous system benign neoplasm that is characterized by the presence of mature ganglion cells and a mature Schwannian stroma and arises from the sympathetic trunk in the mediastinum.
Synonym: Unspecified stage IV carcinoma of lung

Name: nerve compression syndrome
Definition: A leiomyomatosis that is located within the blood vessels.

Name: peroneal nerve paralysis
Definition: A benign perivascular tumor that is characterized as a vascular variant of a glomus tumor.

Name: malignant melanocytic peripheral nerve sheath tumor of mediastinum
Definition: A lipid-rich carcinoma characterized by the presence of cytoplasmic neutral lipids in the vast majority of the malignant cells.

Name: obsolete malignant mediastinal peripheral nerve sheath tumor
Definition: A lipid-rich carcinoma characterized by the presence of cytoplasmic neutral lipids in the vast majority of the malignant cells.

Name: neuropathy
Definition: A nervous system disease that is located_in nerves or nerve cells.

Name: obsolete Hodgkin's lymphoma
Definition: A nervous system disease that is located_in nerves or nerve cells.
